Title: Erfaren og kreativ CRM Manager til fundraising
Description: Elsker du databaser, og brænder for at bruge al den viden de rummer til at give de mennesker vi kommunikerer med den bedste og mest meningsfulde oplevelse? Kan du håndtere alt fra dyb flerdimensionel dataforståelse til databerigelse og strategisk segmentering med blik for forskellige kampagneformål? Er du fuldstændig på hjemmebane i Microsoft CRM 2015, Excel PowerPivot, Scribe og ClickDimensions? Er du opsat på at samarbejde tæt sammen med fundraisere og optimere og give dem det bedste udgangspunkt for at ramme den rigtige målgruppe i kampagner? Har du lyst til at bruge din viden, energi og opfindsomhed i en organisation fuld af ildsjæle der arbejder for at gøre verden til et meget bedre sted, med uddannelse for alle og mindre ulighed og uretfærdighed? Så er du måske vores nye CRM manager i Public Engagement-afdelingen.

IBIS søger en erfaren og kreativ CRM Manager til fundraising Stillingsbetegnelse: IBIS søger en erfaren og kreativ CRM Manager til fundraising Stillingstype: Almindeling ansættelse Ansøgningsfrist: 20. januar 2016 12:00 Lokation: Denmark Kontaktinformation: Susanne Tilsted Kontaktinformation: st@ibis.dk Del: Facebook Twitter LinkedIn E-mail Udskriv Elsker du databaser, og brænder for at bruge al den viden de rummer til at give de mennesker vi kommunikerer med den bedste og mest meningsfulde oplevelse? Kan du håndtere alt fra dyb flerdimensionel dataforståelse til databerigelse og strategisk segmentering med blik for forskellige kampagneformål? Er du fuldstændig på hjemmebane i Microsoft CRM 2015, Excel PowerPivot, Scribe og ClickDimensions? Er du opsat på at samarbejde tæt sammen med fundraisere og optimere og give dem det bedste udgangspunkt for at ramme den rigtige målgruppe i kampagner? Har du lyst til at bruge din viden, energi og opfindsomhed i en organisation fuld af ildsjæle der arbejder for at gøre verden til et meget bedre sted, med uddannelse for alle og mindre ulighed og uretfærdighed? Så er du måske vores nye CRM manager i Public Engagement-afdelingen. Baggrund IBIS engagerer flere og flere danskere i arbejdet for en mere retfærdig verden, hvor alle har lige adgang til uddannelse, indflydelse og ressourcer. Det vil vi gerne gøre så kompetent, effektivt og meningsfuldt som muligt. Vi er derfor midt i at opgradere og integrere alle vores tekniske platforme til at håndtere medlemsdata, og glæder os til at bruge de nye muligheder fuldt ud, under din kyndige og inspirerende styring. Vi er på vej ind i den verdensomspændende organisation Oxfam og sammen med de nye globale kollegaer skal IBIS til at udvikle nye måder at kommunikere interessant og medrivende om udviklingsarbejde og de udfordringer verden slås med. Her er kompetent håndtering af CRM helt afgørende, og det kan du spille hovedrollen i. IBIS søger en kompetent og erfaren CRM ansvarlig, der kan håndtere, udvikle og bevare overblikket over vores CRM og alle de integrationer og datakilder som den skal fungere sammen med. Du skal sikre vores datakvalitet og give strategisk sparring i vores kampagneudvikling i forhold til segmentering og brug af de data vi allerede har. Du skal have en sikker forståelse for markedsføring, salg og loyalitetsbygning, og erfaring med at arbejde med CRM med henblik på dette. Du skalhave erfaring med at arbejde med fundraisingkommunikation og hvervning, enten fra organisationer der ligner os, eller fra en helt anden branche. Vi forventer at du Har uddannelsesmæssige forudsætninger for at forstå, håndtere og arbejde med databaser på meget højt niveau Har solid arbejdserfaring med CRM systemer og datahåndteringsværktøjer som Microsoft CRM 2015, Excel PowerPivot, Scribe og ClickDimensions Er dygtig og omhyggelig med at sikre systematisk løbende kvalitetssikring af data, datahåndtering og workflows med fokus på brugerne Har erfaring med at arbejde med datasiden af web (Drupal) og erfaring med integration mellem web og CRM. Har en solid forretningsforståelse og flair for at se de strategiske muligheder for at arbejde med CRM med henblik på at optimere hvervning, givelyst og fastholdelse Kan bidrage til at udvikle IBIS’ privatgiverfundraising med det perspektiv Kan netværke og samarbejde med vores kolleger og eksterne aktører Har en relevant videregående uddannelse og tre års relevant arbejdserfaring Til gengæld kan vi tilbyde En ambitiøs dansk udviklingsorganisation i et verdensomspændende netværk med stor global kompetence, hvor du får et stort selvstændigt råderum med plads til innovation Muligheden for at påvirke og inspirere IBIS’ måde at kommunikere og relatere til de mennesker, der støtter vores arbejde Oxfams globale netværk og fællesskab, af mennesker verden rundt der arbejder med det samme som dig Et kompetent, engageret, idealistisk og hyggeligt arbejdsfællesskab Stillingen er en fast fuldtidsstilling på 37 timer ugentligt med tiltrædelse 1. marts 2016 eller snarest derefter. Stillingen er placeret på IBIS’ hovedkontor i København i Afdelingen for Public Engagement. Løn- og arbejdsvilkår efter gældende overenskomst og IBIS’ husaftale. Ansøgning, CV og relevante dokumenter sendes via nedenstående link senest 20. januar 2016 kl. 12.00. Samtaler forventes afholdt 26. januar 2016. Spørgsmål kan rettes til Fundraiser Susanne Tilsted st@ibis.dk eller Chef for Public Engagement Annelie Abildgaard: aa@ibis.dk . IBIS betragter mangfoldighed som et aktiv og opfordrer alle uanset alder, køn, religion, seksualitet eller etnisk tilhørsforhold at søge ledige stillinger. Send ansøgning Du har allerede ansøgt Du har allerede sendt din ansøgning med denne e-mail. Hvis du vil ændre din ansøgning, så henvend dig til den rette kontaktperson. Luk

Title: IT-supporter til off-site Service Desk
Description: Er du teknisk velfunderet, serviceminded og brænder for at hjælpe brugere med spændende og komplekse problemstillinger, så kan det være dig, vi søger til JN Datas Service Desk i Roskilde. Dine arbejdsopgaver består i at yde 1. level teknisk support til JN Datas kunder samt interne brugere. Vores Service Desk behandler problemstillinger på bl.a. Windows-platforme, Office-produkter og Citrix ligesom vi håndterer Service Requests såsom applikationstildeling, brugeradministration mv. Henvendelser modtages via enten telefon, ITSM-systemer eller mail og løses typisk ved brug af remote desktop-løsninger.

Jobindex IT-supporter til off-site Service Desk Jobindex A/S søger for JN Data A/S i Roskilde Er du teknisk velfunderet, serviceminded og brænder for at hjælpe brugere med spændende og komplekse problemstillinger, så kan det være dig, vi søger til JN Datas Service Desk i Roskilde. JN Data er en af de absolutte sværvægtere, når vi taler it-drift inden for den finansielle sektor. Det er vores fornemmeste opgave at sikre vores kunder en sikker, stabil og effektiv it-drift. Vi bidrager i høj grad til at videreudvikle vores kunders forretning ved at fungere som sparringspartner både i valget af it-strategi og daglige it-løsninger. En unik kommerciel forretningsforståelse er vores vigtigste konkurrenceparameter. HOVEDFORMÅL MED STILLINGEN Hovedformålet for JN Datas Service Desk er at genoprette den ’normale service’ for brugerne hurtigst muligt ved at reducere den negative indflydelse på servicekvaliteten – dette være sig ved tekniske fejl, opfylde service requests eller besvare forespørgsler – så brugerne dermed igen kan udføre deres arbejde på tilfredsstillende vis. ANSVAR OG ARBEJDSOPGAVER Dine arbejdsopgaver består i at yde 1. level teknisk support til JN Datas kunder samt interne brugere. Vores Service Desk behandler problemstillinger på bl.a. Windows-platforme, Office-produkter og Citrix ligesom vi håndterer Service Requests såsom applikationstildeling, brugeradministration mv. Henvendelser modtages via enten telefon, ITSM-systemer eller mail og løses typisk ved brug af remote desktop-løsninger. Du skal desuden medvirke til at sikre vidensdeling internt i afdelingen, imellem 2. level og respektive funktioner hos kunderne, herunder udarbejde dokumentation, vejledninger og opdatere vidensdatabasen. Herudover vil du have mulighed for at deltage i nogle af vores spændende projekter relateret til Service Desk. KRAV TIL KVALIFIKATIONER Du er: Uddannet IT-supporter, datatekniker eller lignende. Fagligt dygtig med en bred erfaring indenfor Windows-platforme, Office-produkter, brugeradministration og teknikrelateret til arbejdspladser. Har god erfaring med remote desktop support. Har erfaring med ITIL. Måske har du også erfaring med HP Service Manager, Citrix, System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM), SharePoint, og print. Derudover, lægger vi vægt på, at du: Er serviceminded, analytisk og kvalitetsbevidst – du sætter en ære i at yde en god og professionel service Er udadvendt og evner at kommunikere med brugere på vidt forskellige faglige og organisatoriske niveauer Kan holde overblikket i en til tider hektisk hverdag og formår til enhver tid at holde alle interessenter velinformeret Er fleksibel og ønsker at indgå i en skiftende vagtordning i tidsrummet fra kl. 07:15 – 17:00 (18:00 om torsdagen) VI TILBYDER Vi er en dynamisk arbejdsplads i en rivende udvikling, hvor du får din lyst til faglig og personlig udvikling samt kontakt til mange mennesker realiseret. I dagligdagen vil du opleve en uformel omgangstone og et arbejdsmiljø præget af megen aktivitet, arbejdsglæde, faglig sparring og ikke mindst højt humør. Vi tilbyder dig desuden løn efter kvalifikationer samt en attraktiv overenskomst med en god pensionsordning. Som ny medarbejder vil du opleve, at der bliver taget seriøst hånd om din introduktion og oplæring. SÅDAN GØR DU JN Data opfordrer alle interesserede til at søge stillingen, uanset køn, alder, religion og etniske tilhørsforhold. Jobindex er rekrutteringspartner på denne stilling. Du kan læse om vores rekrutteringsproces her . Har du spørgsmål til jobbet, kan du kontakte Jacob Perstrup Matyjasik på tlf. 88 63 00 04. Send CV og ansøgning hurtigst muligt og senest den 24. januar 2016 . Du søger stillingen via ansøgningsknappen ”Søg jobbet online” nedenfor. Ansøgninger modtaget på mail behandles ikke. Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig. JN Data råder over ekspertise indenfor en række avancerede teknologier og har omfattende erfaring i effektiv og pålidelig håndtering af alle aspekter af it-drift og it-infrastruktur. Vi skaber og videreudvikler det teknologiske fundament for Jyske Bank, Nykredit, BEC, SDC og Bankdata. Vi rådgiver vores kunder med kundeindsigt om ny forretningsrelevant teknologi og servicerer dem med sikker, stabil og effektiv it-drift. JN Data har 550 kompetente og resultatorienterede medarbejdere, som betjener 43.000 individuelle arbejdspladser. For yderligere information besøg www.jndata.dk . Skriv venligst i din ansøgning, at du så annoncen hos Jobindex. Cookies på Jobindex Vi bruger cookies til trafikmåling og til optimering af
hjemmesidens indhold. Der gemmes cookies fra Jobindex og fra vores
samarbejdspartnere. Ved at klikke videre på hjemmesiden accepterer
du vores brug af cookies. Læs mere om vores cookies. Accepter

Title: Web- og kommunikationskonsulent med flair for det grafiske
Description: Vi søger en selvstændig og initiativrig Web- og kommunikationskonsulent, som brænder for at arbejde med hjemmesider og det grafiske aspekt i markedsføring. DFF-EDB er et softwarehus, der udvikler og sælger software samt serviceydelser og ITløsninger til forsyningsvirksomheder – primært til fjernvarmeværker. Gennem mere end 25 år har vi opbygget ekspertise indenfor udvikling, support og vedligeholdelse af administrative og tekniske programmer til fjernvarmeværker. Ud over vore kerneprodukter tilbyder vi en hjemmesideskabelon til vore kunder. Alt efter hvilken løsning de ønsker, hjælper vi kunderne med alt fra opbygning og omlægning, til redigering af deres hjemmeside. Vi underviser, rådgiver kunderne og yder dagligt support. Afdelingen er præget af en uformel omgangstone, et loyalt sammenhold og en faglig stolthed.

Events Free e-books Contact True Page Content IT konsulent med udviklerbaggrund Vi du have en udfordrende hverdag, hvor tæt dialog med forretningen er i højsædet, og vil du være en del af et innovativt og udfordrende IT-miljø med ambitiøse mål og kolleger? Så har vi brug for dig som IT Konsulent i vores afdeling Applications, som har applikationsansvaret for virksomhedens koncernsite, ekstranet og intranet, internationale websites samt de kundevendte selvbetjeningsportaler og dokumenthåndteringssystemer. Afdelingen består af 15 medarbejdere i Danmark og 22 medarbejdere i Malaysia, og du bliver en del af en stor IT-organisation med over 400 medarbejdere. Applications er en del af vores Group-funktioner, som dækker over Group Support, Group Finance & Services og Group IT. I Group IT arbejder vi fokuseret på at understøtte hele forretningen og sikre, at virksomheden arbejder som et målrettet og ansvarligt selskab. Dit arbejdssted er på vores kontor i Gentofte nord for København. Dine primære arbejdsopgaver er at indgå i dialog med vores forretning om, hvilke løsninger der bedst understøtter deres behov konfigurere og optimere komplekse workflows og formularer i Nintex og Infopath håndtere incidents på vores proprietære løsninger baseret på Captia, Mdoc og Synergi QHSE, eventuelt i tæt koordination med vores eksterne leverandører deltage i projekter ved opgradering af vores proprietære løsninger, herunder håndtering af scripts og MSI pakker udvikle apps på vores O365 platform, hvis behovet opstår. Dine kvalifikationer og kompetencer omfatter, at du har en kandidatgrad inden for IT eller anden relevant uddannelse har erfaring med Nintex og Infopath har erfaring med relationelle databaser/SQL har kendskab til .NET har kendskab/erfaring med SharePoint har kendskab/erfaring med agile processer, f.eks. Scrum. trives godt med forskelligartede opgaver i et dynamisk miljø, som drives af forretningens prioriteter trives i et internationalt miljø og evner at skabe gode relationer til dine kolleger og vores forretning. Du vil også som nyuddannet kunne komme i betragtning til jobbet, da der vil være mulighed for oplæring. Det vigtigste er, at du trives med forskelligartede opgaver og tæt forretningskontakt. Vi tilbyder Et spændende og ansvarsfuldt job, hvor du i høj grad selv kan være med til at præge udviklingen. Du bliver en del af et innovativt og udfordrende IT-miljø i Danmarks største energivirksomhed med ambitiøse mål og kolleger, der hver dag påvirker fremtidens energiforsyning ved at tilbyde fremtidssikrede og intelligente løsninger. Vi sikrer, at du gennem kurser og træningsforløb udvikler dig fagligt og personligt, og du har gode karrieremuligheder i organisationen. I DONG Energy Group IT har vi et højt fagligt niveau og mange komplekse og udfordrende arbejdsopgaver. Vi arbejder målrettet med at understøtte vores forretning, og vi opbygger interne kompetencer, der har stor indflydelse på kerneforretningen. Hos os vil du opleve en stor forretningsforståelse og et stort ansvar. Kontakt os Du er velkommen til at kontakte Rune Beckgaard Holm, Team Lead i Collaboration & Productivity, på telefon +45 99 55 78 19 , hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen. Vi ser frem til at modtage din ansøgning, dit cv og dine eksamenspapirer i elektronisk form senest den 20. januar 2016. Klik på knappen for at indsende din ansøgning. Title: Senior Project Manager for Global ERP Implementation
Description: As Senior Project Manager, your role is to lead and run the ERP rollout organisation and projects. After having revised the template, updated the project plan, and defined key milestones, you will implement the solution in the countries. Together with a team of experienced Dynamics AX specialists, you will ensure that the implementations are as close to the developed global template as possible, while also trying to meet the individual and legal requirements. Besides ensuring project milestones, you will communicate the value of shared processes and transparency to key stakeholders. Widex offers the possibility to grow within the organization, and a workplace with skilled colleagues in an informal working environment, promoting independence and responsibility.

Please note that this job ad has expired and that the company is probably no longer interested in receiving applications. Widex is a family owned company founded in Denmark in 1956. Today, it is the world’s sixth largest manufacturer of hearing aids. Widex hearing aids are sold in more than 100 countries around the world, and the company employs over 3,800 people worldwide. We develop digital technology at a level of quality that few can match, and this has forged our reputation as one of the most innovative manufacturers in the industry. Our uncompromising approach to innovation has led to such advances as the world’s first digital in-the-ear hearing aid, as well as our own revolutionary wireless technology. Read more at widex.com Senior Project Manager for Global ERP Implementation Unique opportunity for a Senior Project Manager, who is ambitious about working globally, engaging stakeholders and motivating project teams. The role will be responsible for project plans and execution of the ERP rollout, and with direct line management of an ERP project team. During the coming years, the plan is to implement a global ERP template based on Dynamics AX 2012. The project is currently focused on EMEA and is primarily driven by an internal ERP rollout team together with an external partner. The  Project manager will be leading internal and external resources in the ERP roll-out team, and is part of Group IT reporting to the Group CIO and having direct line management for the resources. The role is situated in the HQ in Lynge, and must expect an estimated 80-100 days of travelling yearly. The Role As Senior Project Manager, your role is to lead and run the ERP rollout organisation and projects. After having revised the template, updated the project plan, and defined key milestones, you will implement the solution in the countries. Together with a team of experienced Dynamics AX specialists, you will ensure that the implementations are as close to the developed global template as possible, while also trying to meet the individual and legal requirements. Besides ensuring project milestones, you will communicate the value of shared processes and transparency to key stakeholders. The primary responsibilities in the projects include: •	Overall planning and coordination of all rollout activities. •	Deliver projects within agreed time, cost and quality objectives. •	Manage vendor services, define and follow-up on objectives. •	Budget responsible, forecasting and follow-up. •	Prepare change management activities together with local and regional management. •	Identify and communicate project risks. •	Close communication with and reporting to Steering Committee. •	Motivate, develop and lead project team. •	Internal and external resource planning from different countries. The Profile We expect you to have similar experience from running international ERP implementation projects as project lead, and preferably from a matrix organization. Experience with Dynamics AX is not a requirement, but you have strong experience in one or more ERP systems. You are used to having a certain technical insight, where you can identify risks and opportunities. In your project management, you are used to working according to Time, Cost and Objectives. You may also have been exposed to line management, and are used to developing and motivating a team of employees. You are of course fluent in English and skilled in reporting tools. As a person, you have strong people skills in the sense that you can engage, motivate and understand your surroundings. You are a strong communicator, who can create excitement about project plans and goals, and also create buy-in with your stakeholders. In your projects and in your management, you demonstrate maturity, persistence and strong problem-solving skills. It is natural for you to take the lead, point out the direction and take responsibility, and though having a holistic perspective, you still have a detailed insight in key deliverables. About Widex Widex offers the possibility to grow within the organization, and a workplace with skilled colleagues in an informal working environment, promoting independence and responsibility. Widex offers the opportunity to join a company with a clear growth strategy, and in an organization with an advantageous pension scheme with health insurance, a sports and arts club, and good canteen facilities. Widex is based in environmentally-friendly HQ in Lynge, Denmark. Contact Information For more information about the position you are welcome to call Christian Elimar or Camilla Svendsen from Hudson at +45 7027 7733. Hudson is the recruitment agency handling the selection. Please send your resume and application to dk@hudson.dk, and mark the application with “379”. Events Free e-books Contact True Page Content Solution Architect Kan du omsætte forretningsbehov til konkret løsningsdesign inden for Collaboration og Document Management, og vil du være en del af et innovativt og udfordrende IT-miljø med ambitiøse mål og kolleger? Så har vi brug for dig som Solution Architect i vores afdeling Applications, som har applikationsansvaret for virksomhedens koncernsite, ekstranet og intranet, internationale websites samt de kundevendte selvbetjeningsportaler og dokumenthåndteringssystemer. Afdelingen består af 15 medarbejdere i Danmark og 22 medarbejdere i Malaysia, og du bliver en del af en stor IT-organisation med over 400 medarbejdere. Applications er en del af vores Group-funktioner, som dækker over Group Support, Group Finance & Services og Group IT. I Group IT arbejder vi fokuseret på at understøtte hele forretningen og sikre, at virksomheden arbejder som et målrettet og ansvarligt selskab. Dit arbejdssted er på vores kontor i Gentofte nord for København. Dine primære arbejdsopgaver er at omsætte forretningskrav til konkret løsningsdesign i forbindelse med større og mindre projekter udvikle og optimere en applikationsarkitektur, som afspejler forretningens forventninger fungere som "trusted advisor" for både kunder, product owners og udviklingsteam og dermed sikre en præcis og motiverende dialog løbende udvikle og optimere governance for anvendelse af vores it-platforme, så det understøtter vores langsigtede IT-strategier deltage i ad-hoc udviklingsopgaver, når behovet opstår. Dine kvalifikationer og kompetencer omfatter, at du har en kandidatgrad inden for it eller anden relevant uddannelse er skarp til C#, .NET og TFS/VSO har erfaring inden for mindst en af vores primære teknologier; SharePoint 2013 og Office 365/SPO kan formidle komplicerede emner med overblik og præcision både skriftligt og mundtligt på engelsk trives i et internationalt miljø og evner at skabe gode relationer til dine samarbejdspartnere er lydhør og diplomatisk og evner at skabe resultater på tværs af interessenter samt organisatoriske og kulturelle skel. Vi tilbyder Et spændende og ansvarsfuldt job, hvor du i høj grad selv kan være med til at præge udviklingen. Du bliver en del af et innovativt og udfordrende IT-miljø i Danmarks største energivirksomhed med ambitiøse mål og kolleger, der hver dag påvirker fremtidens energiforsyning ved at tilbyde fremtidssikrede og intelligente løsninger. Vi sikrer, at du gennem kurser og træningsforløb udvikler dig fagligt og personligt, og du har gode karrieremuligheder i organisationen. I DONG Energy Group IT har vi et højt fagligt niveau og mange komplekse og udfordrende arbejdsopgaver. Vi arbejder målrettet med at understøtte vores forretning, og vi opbygger interne kompetencer, der har stor indflydelse på kerneforretningen. Hos os vil du opleve en stor forretningsforståelse og et stort ansvar. Kontakt os Du er velkommen til at kontakte Rune Beckgaard Holm, Team Lead i Collaboration & Productivity, på telefon +45 99 55 78 19 , hvis du vil vide mere om stillingen. Vi ser frem til at modtage din ansøgning, dit cv og dine eksamenspapirer i elektronisk form senest den 31. januar 2016. Klik på knappen for at indsende din ansøgning. Jobindex Information Strategy and Architecture lead Codan Forsikring A/S, Copenhagen RSA Scandinavia is the regional Scandinavian division of RSA, operating in Sweden as Trygg-Hansa, and in Denmark and Norway as Codan. Both in Denmark and in Sweden, Codan and Trygg-Hansa respectively are considered the third largest insurer in their markets and in Norway the company has a growing presence. RSA Scandinavia has around 3,500 employees across the region with head offices in both Copenhagen and Stockholm. Through RSA’s global structure with operations or partner representation around the world, Codan/Trygg-Hansa has access to an extensive international knowledge bank. Information Strategy and Architecture lead As the Information Strategy and Architecture Lead you will take responsibility for defining the enterprise data strategy and architecture needed to deliver the current and future needs of the business. Currently within Codan/TryggHansa there are a number of data related projects and initiatives that are being delivered in isolation outside of an overall data strategy and roadmap. The CTO Scandinavia team owns the IT Strategy, Information Strategy and Architecture, IT Architecture, and IT Security across TryggHansa and CODAN. You will report directly to the CTO. Role and responsibilities You will be responsible for taking a data oversight role and drive the overarching approach to ensure that the business achieves the following: The use of data and the high level data model across the enterprise is understood Assurance that common data reconciles across all systems That key data is mastered in one place and shared across subservient systems Reduced complexity in the information management environment through appropriate data standards The ability to trace the flow of information across all systems in the architecture Meets the needs of any initiating project and can also be extended across the wider enterprise architecture That data usage and retention across the organization is compliant with all current InfoSec and Privacy policies The role will require extensive intra-Nordic travel. Your profile You believe that done is better than perfect and you like to take ownership and drive solutions also outside your immediate domain and responsibilities. You are interested in everything but very, very specialized in something (and able to explain why that is important to RSA Scandinavia). A typical CV would contain: M.sc, B.Sc or equivalent within Informatics or Computer Science domain Experience from IAA or similar framework (TOGAF is a plus) + 3 years experience from IT + 3 years experience from Data Strategy and Architecture or similar + 5 years experience from Insurance or Financial Services Fluent in English Communications or sales training is a plus Application Trygg-Hansa works with Experis in this process. Welcome with your application as soon as possible, as we select applications continuously. For further information about the position please contact Recruitment Advisor Torben Morgengaard (+45) 2778 0421 or Senior Recruitment Advisor Per Tychsen (+45) 2243 6104. Title: Master Data Analyst
Description: Dako, an Agilent Technologies Company is looking for a Mater Data Analyst to the Global Process Governance department within the Global Logistics function. The position is located at our largest European site in Glostrup. The position is a maternity cover ending Nov. 2016. The department is globally responsible for Master Data in the company's ERP system and the surrounding processes. The Master Data responsibility includes commercial data like customer-, price- and discount data as well as production data (products). As an administrative member of Global Process Governance you will work with all types of Master Data on a cross-organizational and global span.

Share Apply Apply with LinkedIn Apply Date Posted: 07/Jan/16 Requisition: 2064909 Job Title: Master Data Analyst Description: Dako, an Agilent Technologies Company is looking for a Mater Data Analyst to the Global Process Governance department within the Global Logistics function. The position is located at our largest European site in Glostrup. The position is a maternity cover ending Nov. 2016. The department is globally responsible for Master Data in the company's ERP system and the surrounding processes. The Master Data responsibility includes commercial data like customer-, price- and discount data as well as production data (products). As an administrative member of Global Process Governance you will work with all types of Master Data on a cross-organizational and global span. The job includes: • Accurate data input in our business applications • Enforcing processes and policies associated with good master data practices • Overseeing the helpdesk system including performing the activities associated with evaluating and responding to customer requests. • Ensuring compliant setup of both production- and commercial master data • Communicating with customers and team members around the globe • Participation in smaller master data related projects as requested Qualifications: Qualifications: • You have an administrative education as a minimum. • You have experience with different administrative tasks. • You have minimim 2 years of experience with this type of Master Data administration • You excel in accurate and swift data entry. • You are computer savvy. • You possess strong communication skills, are customer oriented and have a sense of detail. • You are competent with written and oral English and preferable Danish. • You are experienced with Excel and familiar with SQL. • You are self-oriented and can appreciate a more routine day. • You are very well organized and methodical in your approach to daily tasks and keen with attention to details. • You have experience with working in ERP systems (preferable Oracle) and are system minded in general. You will become part of: • A company with a demanding as well as caring environment based on integrity, information and trust. • An environment with an informal and open way of communicating, characterized by a high degree of independence and responsibility on the part of each employee. • An innovative working environment where initiative and ideas are rewarded. • A competitive salary package that reflects your personal qualifications. Questions: If you have any questions to the position - please contact Recruiter Anja Dyppel +45 3695 3312. Application: Please send your written application and CV via our online recruitment system. About Dako, an Agilent Technologies Company Dako is a global leader in tissue-based cancer diagnostics. Hospital and research laboratories worldwide use Dako’s reagents, instruments, software and expertise to make precise diagnoses and determine the most effective treatment for cancer patients.Dako became part of Agilent Technologies on June 21, 2012. www.dako.com About Agilent Technologies: Agilent is the premier laboratory partner for a better world. We provide life science, diagnostic and applied market laboratories worldwide with instruments, services, consumables, applications and expertise. Agilent enables customers to gain the insights they seek so they can do what they do best: improve the world around us. Information about Agilent is available at www.agilent.com. Forside - Om EDC - Karriere - Ledige stillinger Systemadministrator Systemadministrator søges til Danmarks største ejendomsmæglerkæde. EDC Gruppen A/S søger en dygtig og engageret Systemadministrator til IT-afdelingen, som varetager driften for over 1200 EDC-mæglere fordelt på mere end 230 butikker. IT-afdelingen i EDC består af IT-Drift, IT-support, IT-udvikling samt en IT-projektorganisation, som i alt tæller 30 medarbejdere, og spiller en vigtig rolle i at understøtte EDC organisationens fortsatte vækst. Du får gode muligheder for personlig og faglig udvikling, bl.a. igennem sparring med dine dygtige kolleger i It-afdelingen og igennem samarbejde med erfarne eksterne konsulenter. Spændende opgaver Du vil blive en vigtig ressource i vores IT-driftsafdeling, hvor dine primære arbejdsopgaver vil være: Implementering, drift og vedligehold af EDC’s infrastruktur, herunder indgå i turnus vagtordning Transformering fra Colocation til Infrastructure as a service Opbygning og vedligeholdelse af dokumentation og arbejdsgange Fejlsøgning og løsning af driftsproblemer IT administration IT-sikkerhed 3rd level support Du vil endvidere indgå i projektarbejde på tværs af IT-organisationen, test af egenudviklede programmer samt deltagelse i relevante projektgrupper. Kvalifikationer Vi forventer at du har en dyb teknisk viden og nogle års erhvervserfaring fra en lignende stilling. Du brænder for at arbejde med IT-Drift og de muligheder og udfordringer, der er forbundet hermed. Du kan hurtigt sætte dig ind i nye tekniske områder og omsætte din viden til praksis. Dine faglige kompetencer: VMware vSphere 5/6 Windows Server 2012 R2, Exchange 2013 og MSSQL 2014 Active Directory IIS SAN Netværk (VPN, VLAN, Routing) Network/Storage/Server: performance – fejlsøgning - Monitorering Håndtering af Apps og Applikations virtualisering Det er vigtigt at du evner at bygge bro mellem de øvrige afdelinger i IT-afdelingen og IT-drift. Dette indebærer bl.a., at du ser muligheder for at effektivisere løsningen af opgaverne og har øje for forbedringsmuligheder af de eksisterende arbejdsgange. Du er serviceminded, initiativrig og har lyst til at yde en aktiv og energisk indsats. Du er forandringsparat, har et godt humør og kan, med sans for detaljen og med en stor ansvarsfølelse sikre høj oppetid på EDC´s kritiske systemer. Du kan prioritere dine opgaver og bevare overblikket også i pressede situationer. Endvidere er du fleksibel og kan arbejde selvstændigt såvel som i et team. Vi tilbyder Et særdeles spændende job med høj grad af selvstændighed og med mulighed for god personlig og faglig udvikling. Du bliver en del af en velfungerende IT-organisation, som glæder sig til at få dig med på holdet. Din arbejdsplads vil være på Kædekontoret, Mynstersvej 5, Frederiksberg. Har du spørgsmål til jobbet, er du meget velkommen til at kontakte IT-Driftschef Sonny Silva på mobil 40 42 58 49. Har dette stillingsopslag fanget din interesse, så send ansøgning og CV på mail til job@edc.dk Ansøgningsfrist Du kan søge stillingen, så længe den er at finde på nettet. Vi nedtager opslaget, når stillingen er besat. Vi ønsker stillingen besat snarest muligt. Din ansøgning bedes sendt til os elektronisk. Title: Part-time Software person
Description: The Ida Institute provides tools to help audiologists bring patient-centered care into their appointments. Our website, which boasts 10,000 members, provides tools as PDF downloads and through online platforms. We also have an active community forum and video library. Our site is continuing to grow, and we are looking for someone to help support our expansion. You will play an important role in our small organization where we need a person who can help us 2-3 days a week to develop strong digital solutions, apps, platforms and help us to organize our IT systems and documentation. This could be a perfect position for a talented IT start-up founder looking to supplement his or her income.

Jobindex Part-time Software person Ida Institute, Egebækgård in Nærum The Job: The Ida Institute provides tools to help audiologists bring patient-centered care into their appointments. Our website, which boasts 10,000 members, provides tools as PDF downloads and through online platforms. We also have an active community forum and video library. Our site is continuing to grow, and we are looking for someone to help support our expansion. You will play an important role in our small organization where we need a person who can help us 2-3 days a week to develop strong digital solutions, apps, platforms and help us to organize our IT systems and documentation. This could be a perfect position for a talented IT start-up founder looking to supplement his or her income. Primary tasks: Development/programming of digital solutions, applications and alternative solutions for our website, including documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, as well as code comments and clean code Monitoring of website bugs and malfunctions Managing relationships with all relevant internal stakeholders, to ensure full understanding of the complete platform. Work with our core project teams on the end-to-end digital experience. Drive high quality in all our digital solutions by producing and sparring with our student interns and suppliers Building a trustful partnership with our IT supplier Being our ‘go-to’ person for IT related assistance The right candidate for us is attracted to developing and defining different digital solutions and applications. You should have general programming skills, and have experience with software design, software debugging, and software documentation as well as extensive QA testing experience. Professional qualifications: Ability to work rapidly, creatively and flexibly towards online solutions from various content projects in an international setup Experience with back-end CMS systems such as Typo3 and can code using PHP, C++, or Java Core competencies and experience in online application development such as HTML, CSS and Javascript Experience with development and facilitation of Prototyping, Wireframes, and Mockup/Sketching will be an advantage Personal qualifications: Speak and write English proficiently Work 2-3 days a week (15 to 20 hours a week) from our offices in Nærum You are a team worker with good social skills, and still you are a self-starter and finisher High quality in deliverables and attention to detail is important for you We offer ... you the opportunity to join a team of nine very competent, creative and engaged colleagues, who continuously run innovation processes, create state-of-the-art patient-centered care tools in our field and deploy these as widely as possible. You will work in a successful, high performing institute where you collaborate with globally renowned experts in hearing and patient-centered healthcare. We are located at Egebækgård in Nærum in a beautifully renovated old manor house with a park-like garden. About the Ida Institute Established in 2007 with a grant from the Oticon Foundation, the Ida Institute is an independent, non-profit organization that aims to foster a better understanding of the human dynamics associated with hearing loss. The Institute collaborates globally with hearing care professionals and strategic partners to co-create knowledge and professional tools. We are a highly ambitious and achievement focused workplace. Collaboration, flexibility, fast- paced action and fun are key words of our work life. For further information, please contact Sharmi Albrechtsen on 5117 6876. You may also visit our website www.idainstitute.com . To apply for the job please send your application to jobs@idainstitute.dk by 25 January 2016 . Project Manager Application Deadline: 02 February 2016 Location: DK - Smørum Job Category: Sales Business Solution for Retail Do you thrive in an independent position with a lot of flexibility? Where you get to make decisions about - and plan your own day? Does it appeal to you to have great opportunity to learn and grow in your job? Then you might be our new Project Manager. Fit/Gap analysis and implementation Our Retail solution enables retailers in the hearing aid industry to manage and grow their retail businesses. We are currently looking for a person to lead implementations of our Retail in local retail chains across the world. This is what we are looking for you to accomplish: - Make fit/gap analysis between our Retail solution and business processes - Plan and execute implementations - Training local staff in our Retail solution - Support current installations You will have a large interface and many collaborating partners from local retail chains, corporate IT, management and one of the solution vendors in USA. This is what we are looking for Your educational background is not of primary importance. Therefore, we are looking more at your career history. We are also open to someone with great potential. We will of course make sure, that you will get the right introduction and training in our Business Solutions. As a person you are very conscientious and can work independently. As this is a position that carries a lot of independent responsibility, you possess a “can do” attitude. Furthermore, we are looking for the following: Great overview and structured approach Likes working with details Analytical and good business understanding A good networker who has a positive and friendly outlook Good instructing/teaching skills, which requires fluency in English 30 – 50 travel days must be expected. Want to join? Then send you application as soon as possible and no later than February 2nd 2016. For questions regarding the position please contact Retail Program Manager, Jes Haslund Bisgaard + 45 29 99 01 90. The application can be provided both in Danish or English. We look forward to hearing from you. The Group operates in a global market with own companies in more than 30 countries, a total staff of over 9.000 employees and revenues of over DKK 9 billion. Ansøg online The Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability (DTU Biosustain) at the technical university of Denmark (DTU) is seeking a highly motivated and skilled postdoctoral researcher to help build a web-based software platform for data-driven design of microbial cells and communities. The Center conducts research on metabolic engineering and synthetic biology of microbial and mammalian cell factories for chemical and therapeutic protein production. The position will be within the DD-DeCaF project, which was recently funded by the European Commission to develop new bioinformatics approaches that leverage system-level data for biotechnological applications. With advances in synthetic biology, genomes can now be edited at unprecedented speed and fidelity allowing making multiple changes in the same genome at the same time. This increases the need for computational tools to design cells and communities of cells analogous to the tools used in Computer Aided Design (CAD) of cars, buildings and other man-made objects. The European Commission has awarded 6.3 million Euros to a four-year collaborative project to build a CAD tool, DeCaF, for data-driven design of cells and microbial communities. Applications will range from human health to sustainable production of chemicals. As a successful applicant, you will be part of a diverse team of scientists and engineers from leading academic institutions and innovative companies that will work towards this common goal. Your main responsibility will be establishing the computational resources for designing microbial cell factories and artificial communities of organisms. If you enjoy solving scientific problems programmatically, write code that others can reuse, and are disappointed in the current state of scientific software but would like to help make a difference, then we would like to hear from you. Responsibilities and tasks Implement existing and novel methods for designing microbial cell factories. Optimize, test, and benchmark tools developed by academic and industrial partners within the project. Collaborate with partners in integrating these tools into it into the DeCaF platform. Participate in end-user requirement gathering and testing related to the design components of the DeCaF platform. Maintain a consortium-wide code repository of well documented and tested methods, algorithms, software, and web-services. Establish modern software development practices in the project and help educate scientists and engineers within the project. Qualifications The candidate needs to hold a M.Sc. or Ph.D. degree in a STEM (science, technology, engineering, mathematics) field. The candidate should have significant previous experience with the development of scientific software with a strong focus on algorithm development, code optimization, parallel computing, numerical methods etc. Prior experience with modeling large-scale biochemical networks is highly desirable. Experience in analyzing omics data sets (metabolomics, fluxomics, transcriptomics, proteomics etc) is desirable. The candidate should be able to write high-quality, structured and maintainable code. Applicants with knowledge of Python and its scientific programming stack (Numpy, Scipy, scikit-learn, Pandas, Jupyter notebook, etc.) will be preferred. Applicants that utilize modern software development practices, like test-driven development and continuous integration, in their day-to-day work will be preferred. Experience with determining and alleviating computational bottlenecks by re-implementing them in a more efficient language (e.g. C/C++) and making them accessible through language bindings (swig, cython, etc.) is a plus. Familiarity with popular programming languages used by scientists and engineers (Matlab, R, Mathematica, etc.) is a plus. Experience with the basics of web development and databases is not required but a plus. If you have public profiles in the development community such as on GitHub or StackOverflow, please include the links with your CV or cover letter. We offer We offer an interesting and challenging job in an international environment focusing on education, research, public-sector consultancy and innovation, which contribute to enhancing the economy and improving social welfare. We strive for academic excellence, collegial respect and freedom tempered by responsibility. DTU is a leading technical university in northern Europe and benchmarks with the best universities in the world. Salary and terms of employment The appointment will be based on the collective agreement with the Confederation of Professional Associations (AC). The allowance will be agreed with the relevant union. Workplace and period of employment The place of work is in Hørsholm just north of Copenhagen until mid-2016 and in Lyngby at the main DTU campus from thereon. The period of employment is 4 years. Further information Further information may be obtained from Prof. Markus Herrgard ( herrgard@biosustain.dtu.dk ) or Dr. Nikolaus Sonnenschein ( niso@biosustain.dtu.dk ). You can read more about DTU Biosustain on www.biosustain.dtu.dk Application procedure: Please submit your online application no later than 15 February 2016 . Apply online at www.career.dtu.dk Applications must be submitted as one PDF file containing all materials to be given consideration. To apply, please open the link "Apply online," fill in the online application form, and attach all your materials in English in one PDF file . The file must include: Application (cover letter) CV Diploma (an official translation into English) List of publications Applications and enclosures received after the deadline will not be considered. All interested candidates irrespective of age, gender, disability, race, religion or ethnic background are encouraged to apply. DTU Biosustain is an international research center of excellence developing next generation cell factories and bioprocesses for sustainable production of high-value chemical compounds as well as protein-based products. The center uses advanced metabolic engineering techniques and computational biology ensuring efficient and cost-effective design and construction processes. The center’s activities are a balanced mix of basic and translational research, complemented by an emphasis on business development to facilitate commercialization of new cell factories and associated technologies. DTU Biosustain offers state-of-the-art research facilities and assembles world leaders in the field thus offering a unique platform providing excellent talent development and career opportunities. The Center is based upon a long term grant from the Novo Nordisk Foundation to DTU and it was inaugurated in 2011. It has now more than 220 employees and is still growing. DTU is a technical university providing internationally leading research, education, innovation and public service. Our staff of 5,800 advance science and technology to create innovative solutions that meet the demands of society; and our 10,300 students are being educated to address the technological challenges of the future. DTU is an independent academic university collaborating globally with business, industry, government, and public agencies. Ansøg online The Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability (DTU Biosustain) at the technical university of Denmark (DTU) is seeking a highly motivated and skilled scientific software developer to help build a web-based software platform for data-driven design of microbial cells and communities. The Center conducts research on metabolic engineering and synthetic biology of microbial and mammalian cell factories for chemical and therapeutic protein production. The position will be within the DD-DeCaF consortium, a project recently funded by the European Commission to develop new bioinformatics approaches that leverage system-level data for biotechnological applications. With advances in synthetic biology, genomes can now be edited at unprecedented speed and fidelity allowing making multiple changes in the same genome at the same time. This increases the need for computational tools to design cells and communities of cells analogous to the tools used in Computer Aided Design (CAD) of cars, buildings and other man-made objects. The European Commission has awarded 6.3 million Euros to a four-year collaborative project to build a CAD tool, DeCaF, for data-driven design of cells and microbial communities. Applications will range from human health to sustainable production of chemicals. As a successful applicant, you will be part of a diverse team of scientists and engineers from leading academic institutions and innovative companies that will work towards this common goal. Your main responsibility will be the development of the back-end of the DeCaF software platform especially relating to integrating large-scale data sets with design. Responsibilities and tasks Develop and maintain a microservice framework of Dockerized webservices (visualization, databases, simulation tools etc.) that will form the back-end of the DeCaF platform. Collaborate with partners to develop omics data integration framework for the DeCaF platform. Participate in end-user requirement gathering and testing related to the omics data management components of the platform. Maintain a consortium-wide code repository of well documented and tested methods, algorithms, software, and web-services. Establish modern software development practices in the project and help educate scientists and engineers within the project. Qualifications The candidate needs to hold a M.Sc. or Ph.D. degree in a STEM (science, technology, engineering or mathematics) field. Ability to write high-quality, structured and maintainable code. Experience with server-side programming in Python, Ruby or Node.js. Experience designing data models for database ORMs and writing RESTful APIs. Applicants that utilize modern software development practices, like test-driven development and continuous integration, in their day-to-day work will be preferred. Experience with Docker or deployment of web applications to AWS, Heroku etc. or other deployment and operations knowledge is a plus. Prior experience working with omics data sets (metabolomics, fluxomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, genomics etc) is highly desirable. Prior experience in modeling large-scale biochemical networks is beneficial. If you have public profiles in the development community such as on GitHub or StackOverflow, please include the links with your CV or cover letter. We offer We offer an interesting and challenging job in an international environment focusing on education, research, public-sector consultancy and innovation, which contribute to enhancing the economy and improving social welfare. We strive for academic excellence, collegial respect and freedom tempered by responsibility. DTU is a leading technical university in northern Europe and benchmarks with the best universities in the world. Salary and terms of employment The appointment will be based on the collective agreement with the Confederation of Professional Associations (AC). The allowance will be agreed with the relevant union. Workplace and period of employment The place of work is in Hørsholm just north of Copenhagen until mid-2016 and in Lyngby at the main DTU campus from thereon. The period of employment is 4 years with the possibility for extension. Further information Further information may be obtained from Prof. Markus Herrgard ( herrgard@biosustain.dtu.dk ) or Dr. Nikolaus Sonnenschein ( niso@biosustain.dtu.dk ). You can read more about DTU Biosustain on www.biosustain.dtu.dk Application procedure Please submit your online application no later than 15 February 2016 . Apply online at www.career.dtu.dk . Applications must be submitted as one PDF file containing all materials to be given consideration. To apply, please open the link "Apply online," fill in the online application form, and attach all your materials in English in one PDF file . The file must include: Application (cover letter) CV Diploma (an official translation into English) List of publications Applications and enclosures received after the deadline will not be considered. All interested candidates irrespective of age, gender, disability, race, religion or ethnic background are encouraged to apply. DTU Biosustain is an international research center of excellence developing next generation cell factories and bioprocesses for sustainable production of high-value chemical compounds as well as protein-based products. The center uses advanced metabolic engineering techniques and computational biology ensuring efficient and cost-effective design and construction processes. The center’s activities are a balanced mix of basic and translational research, complemented by an emphasis on business development to facilitate commercialization of new cell factories and associated technologies. DTU Biosustain offers state-of-the-art research facilities and assembles world leaders in the field thus offering a unique platform providing excellent talent development and career opportunities. The Center is based upon a long term grant from the Novo Nordisk Foundation to DTU and it was inaugurated in 2011. It has now more than 220 employees and is still growing. DTU is a technical university providing internationally leading research, education, innovation and public service. Our staff of 5,800 advance science and technology to create innovative solutions that meet the demands of society; and our 10,300 students are being educated to address the technological challenges of the future. DTU is an independent academic university collaborating globally with business, industry, government, and public agencies. Title: IT Administrator
Description: Would you like to build your IT competencies in a collaborative community that keeps 250 million kids playing globally? As our IT Administrator you will be part of our DevOps Team of 8 colleagues. Here, your main responsibility is to make sure that your colleagues’ IT equipment is running smoothly at all times and that your colleagues have the equipment they need. We are an informal organisation with no set processes. So with us, you get to shape the content of your job within its framework and take on more responsibility if you want. We will build your knowledge based on your interests within e.g. servers, cloud, users or Amazon. Also, we are in rapid growth and constantly changing, so if you need new tools or come up with smarter ways of working, we are ready to try your suggestions.

Employer Login MovieStarPlanet Jobs IT Administrator Full-time 2300 Copenhagen S IT Administrator Can you make sure that your creative and dedicated colleagues’ IT equipment is always up and running? Would you like to build your IT competencies in a collaborative community that keeps 250 million kids playing globally? About the Job As our IT Administrator you will be part of our DevOps Team of 8 colleagues. Here, your main responsibility is to make sure that your colleagues’ IT equipment is running smoothly at all times and that your colleagues have the equipment they need. Thus, you keep the internal IT service level up by: troubleshooting hardware and software issues handling purchases of new hardware and software to ensure your colleagues get the equipment they need, when they need it keeping an overview of our licenses and test devices setting up new colleagues’ IT equipment – sometimes with short notice building your server knowledge and, in time, maintaining our servers We are an informal organisation with no set processes. So with us, you get to shape the content of your job within its framework and take on more responsibility if you want. We will build your knowledge based on your interests within e.g. servers, cloud, users or Amazon. Also, we are in rapid growth and constantly changing, so if you need new tools or come up with smarter ways of working, we are ready to try your suggestions. About You You love to service your colleagues and you are the warrant that their equipment is fully functional. Doing so, you translate technical IT lingo into solutions – also for your colleagues that are not that tech savvy. While constantly engaging with your colleagues, you know how to prioritise your tasks to ensure that when an important assignment presents itself, you easily switch tasks. Moreover, you: hold an education within IT, as a supporter, data technician or similar have at least 2 years of operational experience in a similar position, where you have touched upon working with servers speak and write English effortlessly, as we have many nationalities working for us About Us MovieStarPlanet ApS is the company behind MovieStarPlanet.com, BooniePlanet.com and RoboBlastPlanet.com - games and social networks for tweens aged 8-15 years. In virtual worlds each user designs their own MovieStar avatar, Robot or Boonie, which can be used for creating small animated movies. They can also chat, design looks, scrapbooks and clothes, and play mini games with other users. Launched in Denmark in 2009, MovieStarPlanet has since experienced explosive growth. Currently the website is live in 11 European markets as well as the United States, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. Globally it ranks among the most popular virtual worlds for the target group with more than 200 million registered profiles. MovieStarPlanet ApS employs +100 staff and the Head Office is based in the attractive surroundings of the new and modern part of Copenhagen called Ørestad, located very close to the city center and the metro line. Why work with Us? Touch the lives of millions of kids every day. You will get to be part of a fast growing company, producing one of the most popular games/social networks in the world for tweens. Your colleagues are highly qualified, creative and innovative people. We are very ambitious and strive to develop and support the most talked about and played game/social network in the world! We believe in learning by doing and taking ownership of tasks and projects. Besides being a challenging and inspiring place to work, we value having a casual and fun work environment where ideas can flourish. We have employees from all corners of the globe, which provides a vibrant and eclectic atmosphere. The corporate language is English. How to Apply Please apply for this position online by clicking the "Apply for this position" button. Your application should contain the following: A cover letter – including a short description of your educational background, working experience and why you are motivated to work at MovieStarPlanet Your CV and exam results Application deadline is as soon as possible. We will be holding interviews at the earliest convenience. Title: Faglig skribent og webredaktør til BBR
Description: Vil du bringe din viden og erfaring med formidling af tungt fagligt stof til professionelle partnere, borgere og virksomheder i spil? Så har du her muligheden for at blive en del af et spændende team i Ejendomsdatakontoret i SKATs Ejendomsafdeling. Her arbejder vi med digital forvaltning inden for ejendomsdataområdet. Som national myndighed for Bygnings- og Boligregistret (BBR) har SKAT ansvar for at der findes troværdige oplysninger om bygninger og boliger. En vigtig forudsætning er at regler, vejledninger, hjemmesider m.m. er forståelige og let tilgængelige. For at styrke vores formidlingsmæssige kompetence søger vi en person, der evner at sætte sig ind i fagområdet, og i tæt dialog med de registerfaglige kollegaer kan gå i dybden med alt fra bekendtgørelser, vejledninger til bredere formidling via vores ejendomsinformationsportal m.m.

Faglig skribent og webredaktør til BBR Vil du bringe din viden og erfaring med formidling af tungt fagligt stof til professionelle partnere, borgere og virksomheder i spil? Så har du her muligheden for at blive en del af et spændende team i Ejendomsdatakontoret i SKATs Ejendomsafdeling. Her arbejder vi med digital forvaltning inden for ejendomsdataområdet. Ansvar for formidling Som national myndighed for Bygnings- og Boligregistret (BBR) har SKAT ansvar for at der findes troværdige oplysninger om bygninger og boliger. En vigtig forudsætning er at regler, vejledninger, hjemmesider mm. er forståelige og let tilgængelige. For at styrke vores formidlingsmæssige kompetence søger vi en person, der evner at sætte sig ind i fagområdet, og i tæt dialog med de registerfaglige kollegaer kan gå i dybden med alt fra bekendtgørelser, vejledninger til bredere formidling via vores ejendomsinformationsportal mm. Det kræver at du har en god helhedsforståelse og evner at afveje forskellige hensyn i de konkrete formidlingssituationer (fx forvaltningsmæssige, organisatoriske, tekniske og målgruppemæssige). Der er tale om en fast og eventuelt også en midlertidig stilling på 3 år. Aktuelt er formidlingsbehovet stort, da der sker mange ændringer i de kommende år. Bl.a. er der gang i udviklingen af en ny og mere avanceret version af registret, der indgår i et samspil med andre offentlige grunddataregistre. Samtidig udvikles ny funktionalitet og en række dataforbedringer for at understøtte den nye ejendomsvurdering. Eksempelvis skal vi have alle borgere og virksomheder, der ejer bygninger, til at opdatere deres bygnings-oplysninger via en ny digital løsning, gennemføre en ny registrering af alle bygninger til erhverv, landbrug og skovbrug samtidig med at vi lancerer en ny ejendomsinformationsportal. Dine opgaver består primært i: • Udarbejde og vedligeholde retningslinjer for faglig formidling af kontorets opgaver • Være webredaktør for den nye ejendomsinformationsportal • Gennemskrive og modernisere hjemmesiden bbr.dk • Håndtere store og små skriveopgaver i forbindelse med regler, vejledning, informationskampagner mm. • Servicere og samarbejde med de registerfaglige medarbejdere, ofte som en del af et fagligt projekt Arbejdet foregår i et udviklingspræget miljø, med stramme tidsfrister og til tider hektisk aktivitet. Rutineret fagskribent og webredaktør Vi forudsætter, at du har en relevant akademisk uddannelse og erfaring med sammenlignelige opgaver. Du har en stor kommunikationsfaglig viden og erfaring, som du selvstændigt evner at bringe i spil. Det gælder i forhold til egne opgaver og over for de registerfaglige kollegaer, som du formår at udfordre og servicere på en måde så de anvendelsesorienterede budskaber træder frem uden at den faglige præcision går tabt. Det er vigtigt, at du har overblik og kan demonstrere det i praksis, er engageret og pragmatisk anlagt, formår at skabe gode relationer og dermed sikre et godt samarbejde. Endvidere lægger vi vægt på: • Erfaring med formidling af tungt fagligt stof inden for sammenlignelige områder • Erfaring med arbejdet som webredaktør, både drift og udvikling • Erfaring med at arbejde i et CMS-system (vi bruger W2L) • Kendskab til og praktisk erfaring med gængse IT- og web-systemer • Evne til at sætte en dagsorden, herunder arbejde systematik og med ordensans så kommunikation/formidling altid er en tydelig del af kontorets agenda Om afdelingen SKAT har til opgave at sikre registreringen af bygnings- og boligoplysninger (BBR) og distribution af ejendomsdata (OIS). Dette arbejde håndteres af Ejendomsdatakontoret i SKATs Ejendomsafdeling. BBR er en vigtig kilde til information for ejendomsvurderingen og skal i de kommende år udvikles til at understøtte dette behov endnu bedre. BBR er også et grunddataregister, som indgår i det fællesoffentlige grunddataprogram. I Ejendomsdatakontoret får du mulighed for en alsidig faglig og personlig udvikling, og gode muligheder for selv at præge indholdet af din arbejdsdag. Arbejdsformen er en kombination af teamwork og selvstændig opgaveløsning. Vi har et dynamisk og tværfagligt arbejdsmiljø, hvor vi lægger stor vægt på, at det skal være rart at gå på arbejde. Ansøgning og kontakt Send senest den 20. januar 2016 din ansøgning inkl. CV og evt. dokumentation for uddannelse og kompetencer via linket ”søg stillingen”. Du er velkommen til at kontakte kontorchef Søren Rude på tlf. 72 37 86 94 eller via mail på soeren.rude@skat.dk for nærmere oplysninger om stillingen. Løn og ansættelsesvilkår i henhold til gældende overenskomst. Du bliver ansat i Skatteministeriet med tilhørende institutioner. Der er tale om en fast og eventuelt også en midlertidig stilling på 3 år. Arbejdsstedet er: Sluseholmen, København. Skatteministeriet opfordrer alle kvalificerede ansøgere, uanset alder, køn, religion eller etnisk tilhørsforhold til at søge. Stillings-ID 92924 Ansøgningsfrist 20-01-2016 Arbejdssted Sluseholmen 8B, 2450 KBH V Kontaktperson Print SKAT – en arbejdsplads som ingen anden Et job i SKAT betyder, at du bliver en del af de centrale offentlige organisationer i Danmark. Vores opgave er at opkræve skatter og afgifter, told og gæld til det offentlige. Det er en både vigtig og spændende opgave, der stiller krav om professionalisme, høj kvalitet og evnen til at møde borgere og virksomheder med tillid. Vi kan tilbyde dig indflydelse hver dag og god brug af dine kompetencer, når vi løbende udvikler SKAT til at møde samfundets, borgernes og virksomhedernes behov, når de skal have orden i deres skatteforhold. Som ansat i SKAT er du med til at sørge for, at tingene går rigtigt til – og du deler vores ambition om, at omverdenen skal opleve SKAT som en moderne skatteforvaltning. Employer Login Gamblify Jobs Frontend Developer Full-time Copenhagen, Denmark Want to become part of the team that will revolutionize Danish bookmaking? Gamblify is looking for a talented individual who wish to revolutionize the way Danes do sports betting. We are building the next generation of sports betting terminals for the danish market, and would like you to join us on the ride. The Position You will join our betting software development team with the goal of making our betting product the best on the market. This will include: Implementing new features for the QML-based interface used on our betting terminals. Understanding end-customer needs with the goal of improving the overall betting experience. Working together with our backend team in improving our cloud-based server backend. You will get to work with technologies such as: Qt QML Java Benefits At Gamblify we go to big strides in making sure our colleagues enjoy working here. This is a snippet of the benefits we enjoy: Workstation of your choosing Ambitious & talented colleagues Newly renovated office Five weeks vacation A great breakfast and lunch program Company-paid trips About Gamblify Gamblify is a software development company focusing on the danish gambling market. Our goal is to revolutionice the industry with new and innovative products. Our current product porfolio consists of a slotmachine platform, a betting terminal solution and an online casino. The technology stack supporting our products consists of five major elements: Our own Linux distribution based on Buildroot Games created using Unity3D, Cocos2D and Godot Menu systems made with Qt and QML Java based server backend hosted on Amazon Web Services Administration websites developed using Ext JS In addition to this we create the occational custom circuit board. Title: Digital projektleder (fuldmægtig) til Miljø- og Fødevareministeriets departement
Description: Miljø- og Fødevareministeriet søger en digital projektleder i Koncern Kommunikation. Vi har brug for en projektleder, der kan medvirke til at gennemføre en række udviklings- og konverteringsprojekter på ministeriets web- og intranetplatforme. Som digital projektleder har du ansvar for gennemførelsen af dine projekter fra start til slut. Det forventes derfor, at du kan udarbejde projektinitieringsdokumenter med business cases, kravspecifikationer, risikoanalyser, leveranceplaner og projektevaluering m.v., og at du kan styre eksterne leverandører og har sans for systematisk at følge op og afrapportere. Derudover forventer vi, at du har stor viden om CMS-systemer, forstår teknologien og har erfaring med udvikling af hjemmesider og intranet.

Digital projektleder (fuldmægtig) til Miljø- og Fødevareministeriets departement Ansøgningsfrist: 19-01-2016 Tip en ven Print jobopslag Stillingen er til besættelse snarest muligt. Miljø- og Fødevareministeriet søger en digital projektleder i Koncern Kommunikation.  Vi har brug for en projektleder, der kan medvirke til at gennemføre en række udviklings- og konverteringsprojekter på ministeriets web- og intranetplatforme. Om os Koncern Kommunikation står for udvikling, drift og support af hjemmesider og intranet i koncernen. Vi lægger vægt på at have et stærkt fagligt miljø, hvor vi kan sparre med hinanden, og hvor vi kan udvikle os, arbejde effektivt og nå vores mål.  Du skal have lyst til at indgå i et velfungerende og effektivt webmiljø og bidrage til at skabe innovative og brugervenlige løsninger. Vi tilbyder Som digital projektleder har du ansvar for gennemførelsen af dine projekter fra start til slut. Det forventes derfor, at du kan udarbejde projektinitieringsdokumenter med business cases, kravspecifikationer, risikoanalyser, leveranceplaner og projektevaluering m.v., og at du kan styre eksterne leverandører og har sans for systematisk at følge op og afrapportere.  Derudover forventer vi, at du har stor viden om CMS-systemer, forstår teknologien og har erfaring med udvikling af hjemmesider og intranet. Du har gerne flere velgennemførte projekter bag dig og kan tænke webstrategisk, og du vil komme til at arbejde tæt sammen med kolleger i departement og styrelser samt eksterne webleverandører. Dine kvalifikationer Vi ser gerne, at du: har en relevant videregående uddannelse på kandidatniveau har flere års erfaring i at arbejde med CMS-systemer og erfaring med brugervenlighed, informationsarkitektur og design har erfaring med webprojektledelse og gerne en formel projektlederuddannelse, fx PRINCE2, eller har lyst til at få det er struktureret i din opgaveløsning har en god forretningsforståelse og har fokus på at få forretningen og kundernes behov til at mødes er god til at arbejde både selvstændigt og samarbejde med andre på alle niveauer og fagområder i organisationen kan formulere teknisk viden til ikke-teknikere og kan formidle ideer, planer og resultater har lyst til at varetage både drifts-, support og udviklingsmæssige arbejdsopgaver og bidrage til et godt socialt og fagligt arbejdsmiljø i Koncern Kommunikation har erfaring med at styre leverandører og evt. prøvet at gennemføre EU-udbud Fuldmægtigstillingen er omfattet af AC-overenskomsten med mulighed for forhandling af tillæg. Ansættelsesområdet er Miljø- og Fødevareministeriet med tilhørende institutioner, og tjenestestedet er indtil videre departementet. Ansøgning Vi glæder os til at modtage din ansøgning. Du søger stillingen online på vores jobportal ved at trykke på ”Søg stillingen” nederst i stillingsopslaget senest tirsdag den 19. januar 2016 . Ansøgningen bedes vedlagt dokumentation for uddannelse, CV samt eventuelle referencer. Samtaler forventes afholdt i uge 3/4. Miljø- og Fødevareministeriet opfordrer alle interesserede, uanset personlig baggrund, til at søge stillingen. Yderligere oplysninger Hvis du vil høre mere om jobbet, er du velkommen til at kontakte webleder Sanne Olsen, tlf.25 23 84 17, sols@mfvm.dk eller kommunikationschef Lene Lund Hansen, tlf. 25 42 01 34 llha@mfvm.dk. Du kan læse mere om Miljø- og Fødevareministeriet på vores hjemmeside www.mfvm.dk .

Title: IT Graduate
Description: Do you have the confidence to make visions reality and promote innovations? Do you like to be challenged through complex IT projects? Are you willing to constantly learn and develop in a huge kitchen organization with a lot of different brands? If so, the IT track at the Nobia Graduate Programme could be your passport to a brilliant career. You will develop your skills to design, execute and follow-up on a variety of projects while building a solid basis of IT and system knowledge, covering subjects as design, specifications, test and implementation. As you work your way across different areas and functions, you will not only acquire extensive IT knowledge, but also develop core managerial skills for a successful career at Nobia.
